text: right|Gabriel Gorce Yepes|thumb Gabriel Gorce Yepes (born August 2, 1990 in Madrid) is a skier from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a type B2 skier. He has raced with skiers who help him go down the mountain including Aleix Suñé, Félix Aznar and Arnau Ferrer. He raced in the European Cup and the IPC Alpine Skiing World Cup, at the IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships and the 2010 Winter Paralympics. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:2010 Winter Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Gabriel Gorce
